name: Rachael's Creamed Spinach
ingredients: 20 ounces frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained well

instructions.en: Thaw the frozen chopped spinach and drain it well, squeezing out excess water.
instructions.sk: Rozmrazte mrazenú nasekanú špenát a dobre ju odkvapkajte, vytlačte prebytočnú vodu.
instructions.ja: 冷凍ほうれん草を解凍し、よく水気を切り、余分な水分を絞り出します。

instructions.en: In a medium skillet, heat the butter and heavy cream over medium heat until bubbly.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej panvici zohrejte maslo a smotanu na strednom ohni, kým nezačnú bublať.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのフライパンで、中火でバターと生クリームを泡立つまで加熱します。

instructions.en: Add the well-drained spinach to the skillet. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
instructions.sk: Pridajte do panvice dobre odkvapkanú špenát. Ochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 水気をよく切ったほうれん草をフライパンに加えます。塩コショウで味を調えます。

instructions.en: Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the spinach is heated through, about 3 minutes.
instructions.sk: Varte na strednom ohni, občas premiešajte, kým sa špenát neprehreje, asi 3 minúty.
instructions.ja: 中火で時々かき混ぜながら、ほうれん草が温まるまで約3分間調理します。

notes: Ensure the spinach is well-drained to avoid a watery dish. You can adjust the amount of cream to achieve your desired consistency. This creamed spinach is a quick and easy keto-friendly side dish.
